---
title: "Salmon Analysis - ZM T0 to T48"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(DESeq2)


load("../../../data/ZM_data.RData")
dds
results <- results(dds)
resultsNames(dds)

```


# t0 to t48
## Unrestricted

### Summary
```{r}
results_t0_to_t48 <-
  results(dds, contrast = c("timepoint", "t48", "t0"))

summary(results_t0_to_t48)

```


### MA Plot
```{r}
plotMA(results_t0_to_t48)
```


## Restricted
### Summary

```{r}
results_t0_to_t48_restricted <-
  results(
    dds,
    alpha = 0.1,
    lfcThreshold = 1,
    contrast = c("timepoint", "t48", "t0")
  )
summary(results_t0_to_t48_restricted)

```


### MA Plot
```{r}
plotMA(results_t0_to_t48_restricted)
```
